subject: Re: [cc-devel] [Cctools-cchost]  Media Hosting Wishlist
body:
On Thu, 2007-04-19 at 14:35 -0700, Jon Phillips wrote:
> On Wed, 2007-04-18 at 08:01 -0400, Nathan R. Yergler wrote:
> > Jon Phillips wrote:
> > > Heya, Mike and I have been working up this document as a best
> > > practice/wishlist of media hosting features a site should have at this
> > > point in time to best support Creative Commons licensing.
> > > 
> > > Would you all take a look at it, make some edits on it, possibly
> > > add/subtract and criticize what is up there please?
> > 
> > Looks like a good start; one thing I'm not at all clear on is what's 
> > supposed to go under ".com integration".  Is that the equivalent of 
> > "more rights", etc?
> 
> Mike, what were you thinking by this? I've heard this called CC+
> (cc-plus) as well, is this the same?
> 
> Could you flesh that one out and/or direct one of us too?

Yes, it is "more rights" and more, to be defined.  I'll flesh it out
soon.
